subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: Michael Edwards
full_text:
--0-1403867836-1207685205=:30768
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Not bad for the radio shack 12-469.
   
  I love this radio, and as you and others noted, the am band is best.  I am thinking on buying another as the radio shack can not keep them on the shelves, -just for backup, I think I should get one.
   
  I am still playing with how close do I get the recorder to the speaker, and what the radio volume should be. I just can not seem to get the right combo.
   
  Bruce, Frank, Steve, Misty, others, where do the spirits latch their voice on? Is it at the speaker in the white noise of the continuous scan?  My digital recorder is about two inches long. Should I place it one recorder length away from the external speaker

Kristin Morris <ckmorris95@...> wrote:
              Great clips Michael!
  k
  
      
---------------------------------
  
  From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, April 08, 2008 2:19 PM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EVP-ITC] New file uploaded to EVP-ITC

  
        
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

File : /Mike Edwards Files/Spirit says Mike Edwards.mp3 
Uploaded by : f1cracker75 <f1cracker75@...> 
Description : Spirit says my first and last name. 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Mike%20Edwards%20Files/Spirit%20says%20Mike%20Edwards.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

f1cracker75 <f1cracker75@...>



  



  

                           


Michael Edwards: Cary, North Carolina. f1cracker75@...
       
---------------------------------
You rock. That's why Blockbuster's offering you one month of Blockbuster Total Access, No Cost.
